page.title: 13Battlesbridge as a centre.
page.content: Battlesbridge is a small village between Rayleigh and Chelmsford.It has now been by passed by the new A130.50 people were asked these questions:a) Why have you visited Battlesbridge? b)From where have you come?Reasons for visiting were:antique shops 40,nursery 4,antique market 3,friends 2,fishing 1.These results show the importance of the antique centre to Battlesbridge , attracting 86% of all visitors.The effect of the new road would not seem to have reduced the pull of the antique centre.The nursery has much competition,47 people came from Essex, 2 from Kent and 1 from Hertford.8 came from Southend,6 each from Wickford & Battlesbridge and 5 each from Leigh & Hullbridge.This shows that the village and antique centre is well known in E. Essex and its attraction is also felt outside the county.
